text: Khudlovo (Ukrainian: Худльово; Hungarian: Horlyó; Rusyn: Ху́дльово) is a village in the Uzhhorodskyi Raion in the Zakarpattia Oblast in western Ukraine. In 1910, out of 1,274 inhabitants, 25 were Hungarians, 172 Germans, and 1,031 Ruthenians. Of these, 34 were Roman Catholics, 1,066 were Greek Catholics, and 173 were Jews. Category:Settlements of Uzhhorod District Category:Villages in Ukraine
title: Khudlovo
